entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 11. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
